Articles.Content:
Read this and let me know what you think...well if you would like. I haven't written in a while and am curious as to what you all would think

[http://www.inkitt.com/stories/19089](http://www.inkitt.com/stories/19089)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T16:28:26Z" title="08/12/2015 04:28  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by Jatwaa**
  
Fixed link
I think your link is broken, at least I can't read anything. Just gives me some sort of editor.

.I'm scared to read..

- - - Updated - - -

And.. nightmares ensue.
